sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
below something else
, je nižje kot nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: The sun had just sunk below the horizon.
Their office is on the floor below.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
below a particular amount, rate, or level
, je manjše kakor tista količina, cena ali raven.

seg.quote: Their reading ability is below average.

sense.def:
Z besedo
below
v pisnem sestavku omenimo nekaj, kar bomo opisali pozneje.

seg.quote: Get legal advice on how to do this (see below).
